description: Waisea Nayacalevu leaves Ospreys without playing a game because of personal reasons.
title: Ospreys: Waisea Nayacalevu leaves without playing a game for personal reasons
title_page: Ospreys: Waisea Nayacalevu leaves without playing a game for personal reasons - BBC Sport
maintext:
Waisea Nayacalevu has left Ospreys without playing a game because of personal reasons.
Fiji international Nayacalevu, 34, joined Ospreys from Sale on a short-term deal in February as cover for injured Wales centre Owen Watkin.
But he did not feature in United Rugby Championship (URC) matches against Glasgow and Connacht, with head coach Mark Jones saying last weekend: "He has got a personal matter at the moment where we are allowing him to spend time with his family.
"We feel that is important and we are giving him the time to get that right.
"Once that is bottomed out we will see where he is at and where we can go next with him."
